title: Quilting Calculator: Fabric, Backing & Binding Yardage

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $ TotalLength = QuiltLength + (2 \times Overhang) $ $ TotalWidth = QuiltWidth + (2 \times Overhang) $ $ Seams = 0.5 \text{ inches (assumed)} $ $ UsableFabricWidth = FabricWidth - (2 \times Seams) $ $ StripsNeeded = \lceil TotalWidth / UsableFabricWidth \rceil $ $ TotalYardage = (StripsNeeded \times TotalLength) / 36 $

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $ Perimeter = 2 \times (QuiltLength + QuiltWidth) $ $ Extra = 10 \text{ inches (for corners & joining)} $ $ TotalBindingLength = Perimeter + Extra $ $ StripsNeeded = \lceil TotalBindingLength / FabricWidth \rceil $ $ TotalYardage = (StripsNeeded \times BindingStripWidth) / 36 $

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $ CutSize = FinishedSize + (2 \times SeamAllowance) $ $ PiecesPerStrip = \lfloor FabricWidth / CutSize \rfloor $ $ StripsNeeded = \lceil NumberOfSquares / PiecesPerStrip \rceil $ $ TotalYardage = (StripsNeeded \times CutSize) / 36 $
